description: After being infused with the power of nature, part of the ritual of the bloodthornes was the implantation of a symbiotic plant.  You aren't sure where it came from or what its natural habitat is, but now it's a part of you.  You require slightly more food and water than normal to feed it, but have the power to fight back against the blood-drinkers..

name: Thornwitchery
description: This is the schoool trait for Bloodthorne Druids.  You shouldn't see it directly.
You can cause a sudden outgrowth of your Heartvine into a living whip-like weapon, ready to scourge the undead.
activation_msg: A vine erupts from your arm and wraps around your wrist before snugly fitting itself into your hand.

description: The first principle of avoiding the blood-drinkers is to avoid losing your blood.  While standing on natural foliage, you can use this spell to replenish any lost blood.
